verses.text: Now when all this was finished, all Israel that were present went out to the cities of Judah, and brake the images \add in pieces\add*, and cut down the groves, and threw down the high places and the altars out of all Judah and Benjamin, in Ephraim also and Manasseh, until \add they\add* had utterly destroyed \add them all\add*. Then all the children of Israel returned, every man to his possession, into their own cities.

And Hezekiah appointed the courses of the priests and the Levites after their courses, every man according to his service, the priests and Levites for burnt offerings and for peace offerings, to minister, and to give thanks, and to praise in the gates of the tents of the \sc Lord\sc*.

\add He appointed\add* also the kingâ€™s portion of his substance for the burnt offerings, \add to wit\add*, for the morning and evening burnt offerings, and the burnt offerings for the sabbaths, and for the new moons, and for the set feasts, as it is written in the law of the \sc Lord\sc*.
Moreover he commanded the people that dwelt in Jerusalem to give the portion of the priests and the Levites, that they might be encouraged in the law of the \sc Lord\sc*.

And as soon as the commandment came abroad, the children of Israel brought in abundance the firstfruits of corn, wine, and oil, and honey, and of all the increase of the field; and the tithe of all \add things\add* brought they in abundantly.

And \add concerning\add* the children of Israel and Judah, that dwelt in the cities of Judah, they also brought in the tithe of oxen and sheep, and the tithe of holy \add things\add* which were consecrated unto the \sc Lord\sc* their God, and laid \add them\add* by heaps.
In the third month they began to lay the foundation of the heaps, and finished \add them\add* in the seventh month.
And when Hezekiah and the princes came and saw the heaps, they blessed the \sc Lord\sc*, and his people Israel.
Then Hezekiah questioned with the priests and the Levites concerning the heaps.

And Azariah the chief priest of the house of Zadok answered him, and said, Since \add the people\add* began to bring the offerings \add into\add* the house of the \sc Lord\sc*, \add we\add* have had enough to eat, and have left plenty: for the \sc Lord\sc* hath blessed his people; and that which is left \add is\add* this great store.
Then Hezekiah commanded to prepare chambers in the house of the \sc Lord\sc*; and they prepared \add them\add*,
and brought in the offerings and the tithes and the dedicate \add things\add* faithfully: over which Cononiah the Levite \add was\add* ruler, and Shimei his brother \add was\add* the next.

And Jehiel, and Azaziah, and Nahath, and Asahel, and Jerimoth, and Jozabad, and Eliel, and Ismachiah, and Mahath, and Benaiah, \add were\add* overseers under the hand of Cononiah and Shimei his brother, at the commandment of Hezekiah the king, and Azariah the ruler of the house of God.

And Kore the son of Imnah the Levite, the porter toward the east, \add was\add* over the freewill offerings of God, to distribute the oblations of the \sc Lord\sc*, and the most holy \add things\add*.

And next him \add were\add* Eden, and Miniamin, and Jeshua, and Shemaiah, Amariah, and Shecaniah, in the cities of the priests, in \add their\add* set office, to give to their brethren by courses, as well \add to\add* the great as \add to\add* the small:

beside their genealogy of males, from three years old and upward, \add even\add* unto every one that entereth into the house of the \sc Lord\sc*, \add his\add* daily portion for their service in their charges according to their courses;
both \add to\add* the genealogy of the priests by the house of their fathers, and the Levites from twenty years old and upward, in their charges by their courses;

and to the genealogy of all their little ones, their wives, and their sons, and their daughters, through all the congregation: for in their set office they sanctified themselves \add in\add* holiness:

also of the sons of Aaron the priests, \add which were\add* in the fields of the suburbs of their cities, in every several city, the men that were expressed by name, to give portions to all the males among the priests, and to all that were reckoned by genealogies among the Levites.
And thus did Hezekiah throughout all Judah, and wrought \add that\add* which \add was\add* good and right and truth before the \sc Lord\sc* his God.
And in every work that he began in the service of the house of God, and in the law, and in the commandments, to seek his God, he did \add it\add* with all his heart, and prospered.
